long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guider is an intuitive web page editor that lets you move elements, edit text, replace images, and adjust fonts and colors on any webpage. Experiment with design – no coding required

List of available features:

Selection
• Click to select, Ctrl + Click to add/remove elements from selection.
• Shift + Click for smart selection of similar elements, click again to refine.

Editing
• Double-click text to edit and access font settings.
• Double-click an image to replace it or upload your own. Drag and drop images to replace selected ones.
• Paste copied images or URLs onto selected elements.

Shortcuts
• Copy/Cut: Ctrl + C/X
• Paste: Ctrl + V
• Undo/Redo: Ctrl + Z/Ctrl + Shift + Z
• Delete: Remove selected elements with Delete key.

Moving & Resizing
• Move elements freely; hold Shift to limit to one axis.
• Hold Alt while dragging to resize, or Alt + Ctrl to maintain proportions.

Styling
• Use the text menu to adjust font, size, weight, line height, and spacing.
• Set text alignment, change casing, or add decorations (underline, bold, italic).
• Use the color picker or input HEX, RGB, or HSL values. Adjust hue, saturation, and transparency.

Preview
• Click the Eye icon to preview without interface.
• Toggle the extension on/off with the extension button.

Rulers & Guides
• Drag rulers from the edges to create guides. Shift to snap guides to edges/center, Alt for temporary guides.
• Right-click the ruler for grid options: set columns, gap size, and width.
